snippet: The Xerox Mobile Scanner can scan and transmit photos and PDF documents wirelessly. But there’s a small obstacle to overcome first.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column favorably reviews the new Xerox Mobile Scanner, priced at $250; points out its truly useful twist is that it can be completely wireless; notes the Eye-Fi card setup can take awhile.
lead_paragraph: The Xerox Mobile Scanner can scan and transmit photos and PDF documents wirelessly. But there’s a small obstacle to overcome first.

headline.seo: A Truly Wireless Mobile Scanner From Xerox - State of the Art
